coreAttributes.authorTag: The clothing's tag reads: 'Created by TonyJC, with implementation and editing by NeverLucky'
coreAttributes.name: cropped T-shirt
coreAttributes.description: A unisex revealing fabric shirt, named after the T shape of its body and sleeves.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc.her] [npc.arms] through the cropped T-shirt's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc.her] head.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the cropped T-shirt's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] head.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the cropped T-shirt's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] T-shirt back down, covering [npc.her] cropped torso.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] T-shirt back down, covering [npc2.her] cropped torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] T-shirt back down, covering [npc2.her] cropped torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] T-shirt up to just below [npc.her] chin, fully exposing [npc.her] cropped torso.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] T-shirt up to just below [npc2.her] chin, fully exposing [npc2.her] cropped torso.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] T-shirt up to just below [npc2.her] chin, fully exposing [npc2.her] cropped torso.
